amendment.description: Amendment prohibits noncitizens from making contributions to candidates for Federal, State, or local elections or contributing to a committee of a political party.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to ban campaign contributions by noncitizens to candidates for Federal, state, or local election.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Stearns to the Shays amendment (A002).
